snippet: Silvia Alvarado and her husband left war-torn El Salvador and arrived here with nothing, and worked to make a home and a family. Then they lost all their belongings in a fire.
abstract: Children’s Aid Society, recipient agency of The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, donates $1,300 for winter clothing and home goods to Silvia Alvarado and her family, who lost all their belongings in an apartment fire.
lead_paragraph: Silvia Alvarado and her husband left war-torn El Salvador and arrived here with nothing, and worked to make a home and a family. Then they lost all their belongings in a fire.

headline.print_headline: Starting From Scratch, a Second Time
headline.main: Starting From Scratch, a Second Time
